attributes.action: Stop primarily school children from returning to school on the 4th of January.
attributes.additional_details: Parents should have the choice to send their children back to school without feeling worried about if or not they will be fined. Children’s health should be a priority and parents should be able to make a decision about their own child’s health and safety.
attributes.background: Considering the current situation of the Pandemic with confirmed cases and deaths rising, the government need to understand that parents will feel uncomfortable about sending their children back to school.
